q: What are the yearly maintenance costs for flood barriers?
a: Expect $100–$250 per year for standard residential systems—includes inspection, gasket checks, and resealing. DIY inspections reduce cost further. See maintenance guide.

q: How often should I budget for gasket replacement?
a: Every 5 years in coastal climates; kits cost about $50 per opening. Include in your maintenance plan.

q: Do motorized barriers cost more to maintain?
a: Slightly—annual service for actuators averages $150 plus optional battery replacement every 5 years. See motorized barriers.
